title: S2 Ep56: The Reincarnation of Marilyn Monroe w/ Sherrie Lee Laird - Hr.2
itunes:title: The Reincarnation of Marilyn Monroe w/ Sherrie Lee Laird - Hr.2
description: Dr. Adrian Finklestein is a huge believer in the field of reincarnation and he believes he has found the Holy Grail in Sherrie Lee Laird.  Sherrie believes in a past life she was Marilyn Monroe and has some compelling evidence to back it up!  In hour 2, we introduce Sherrie Lee Laird, and she lays out exactly why she believes she was Marilyn Monroe in a past life!
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
